summary: Well, hello. There's dark brotherhood 2K Armor Retexture by 100% mine :D You can select 1 of 3 versions: Normal, Dark, Black. If you like it, you know what to do...
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][size=6]RAXXAR IT'S ME(FOXYGAMESPOLSKA ARE VERY OLD NICK)[font=Comic Sans MS]

DARK BROTHERHOOD 2K RETEXTURE
[/font][/size][/center][center][size=5][size=6][/size]BY RAXXAR(MEH)

[/size][size=3]This mod adds a new 2K retexture of DB armor. This is 100% made by me


[/size][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6]1.SELECT VERSION
[/size][/font][size=3]I made 3 versions:
-Normal
-[color=#ff0000]Dark[/color]
-[/size][color=#000000][size=3]Black

[/size][/color][color=#ffffff][size=3]Normal version have normal brightness. Dark version have low brightness. In Black version red are black, so all are black xD


[/size][/color][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffffff][size=6]2.INSTALL
[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffffff][size=4]Nexus Mod Manager:
[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffffff][size=3]Just download with NMM selected version.

[size=4]Mod Organizer:[/size]
Download with nmmhandler or download manually and install in MO

[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffffff][size=4]Manually(Not Recomended)
[size=3]Extract textures folder into your skyrim/data/.
Default:[/size] [/size][/color][/font][size=3]C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim/data[/size][size=5]


[/size][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6]FIND ME:
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][color=#351c75][size=6][font=Comic Sans MS][url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwdAWSKdZjuU296XqmDV8Jw?view_as=subscriber]YouTube[/url][b]﻿[/b][b]﻿[/b][/font][/size]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/inspektor_raxxar/]Steam[/url]﻿[/color][/size][/font][/center]
author: Raxxar
